text: Masikin, balam jômin Pathien makunga tute dik intum mak ngei, ti hih ânthâr zoi; Pathien lekhabu'n, “taksôn sika Pathien makunga dik intum ngei vai ring an tih,”3:11 Pathien makunga dik intum ngei vai ring an tih; nônchutaksôn sika Pathien makunga dik intum ngei vai ring an tih.3:11: Heb 2:4 ati sikin.
